alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 5:18PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Citrus, northern Sumter, Pasco, Hernando, Pinellas and Hillsborough Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 517 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles west of Pine Island to 8 miles west of Beacon Square to 11 miles southwest of Harbor Bluffs. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Spring Hill, Clearwater, Largo, Pinellas Park, Plant City, Temple Terrace, Seminole, New Port Richey, Zephyrhills, Brooksville, Inverness, Wildwood, Dade City, Bushnell, Hudson, Fort Desoto Park, Holiday, Fish Hawk, and Saint Petersburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central and west central Florida.
